comment.body: ZeroNet network transmission is already encrypted by default. And if you are worried one day policy has physical access to your computer, you should enable full disk encryption with your OS.

"government, so there is no point in that =( They can just make me tell them the password." In some countries, the law system permits you to hold the password. In other countries, If you are using LUKS, you only need to wipe a few bytes (header) to make the whole disk unrecoverable. For example, `head -c 1052672 /dev/zero > /dev/sde1; sync` Prepare it in a shell script and run it when the policy knock your door.
@Jayofthezero: http://www.twister.net.co  It uses a blockchain to mapping user nicknames to key and DHT for posts.  It is slow on my machine.

Both `/boot` and `swap` can be put on LVM. Leaving them out helps you to boot the system when LVM volumes are broken. But you can use LiveUSB to rescue your system. So I think there is no need to leave `/boot` and `swap` out of LVM.
@Musickiller: I do not think this is a problem, since old comments will not appear.
@Musickiller: To be safe, keep the whole `/data` directory.
@Fav: brave does not support extensions yet (desktop) and no offline pages (mobile).
你 follow 的人不多吧
I heard that cmus uses less resources than moc. I uses moc since both are light weight and cmus's UI is unnatural.

"Encrypted home has passphraze and keyfile (that placed in encrypted root) to unlock" This setup is mostly used for encrypted home and unencrypted root. Consider 1) put root and home in same partition or 2) LVM on luks
@Musickiller: This is not my site. You can set your browser proxy to 127.0.0.1:CLOSED_PORT when viewing zero sites to avoid information leak to clearnet.

@GomZik: lvm so you only need to type passphrase once. keyfile protected with passphrase on nonencrypted root if you do not want to encrypt full system. "I unlock root using passphrase, then home will be unlocked by /c/key1 keyfile automaticaly." This will work if `c/key1` is not passphrase protected. Your crypttab file seems fine./etc/fstab. Are other setup (`cryptsetup luksAddKey /dev/sda5  /c/key1` and `/dev/mapper/chrome /home ...` in `/etc/fstab`) correct?
@GomZik: Weird. Anything special in dmesg log?

On my machine, procmail recommends a mta(mail transport agent). And it seems postfix is the default mta on your machine. Use `apt-get --no-install-recommends` to install procmail without recommemds or install any package providing mta before install procmail.
@Erneraude: I also uses terminology.
@Shellbound: It is part of Tizen/Enlightenment. I found nothing odd except that its settings window's fonts is small. And soon I began to think other terminal emulators are odd. ;-)
@Talnicrom: Instead of exchanging money with a bank, you exchange a money with a network of banks (exchanges within the bank network  are based on blockchain).

Just click link with middle key. I rebind my mouse's middle key to nonprimary key (or right key, but I use right key as primary key, a.k.a left hand), since the clicking scroll wheel a lot hurts my fingers.

@Suzo: New tech is not always better. For example, current only Gecko has nice MathML support. (Opera used to have css based MathML rendering, which was dropped when they move to blink, a.k.a. chromium's webkit fork.)

@P2P: 没写过 Android. 不过只是打包 zeronet 的话大概用不到多少 Android API. 打包 msgpack, gevent 和 python，加上 zeronet，Java 只用写点击图标开停 zeronet.py，（如果机子上有 adb 的话，用户可以直接开 adb 跑，这样图标和Java都不用弄），交互界面就用浏览器。

"To help you understand this, think about illegal downloading. ... pirated movie" The example has nothing to do with pirated movie. It could be non pirated movie, or non movie (free software distribution, etc). Sadly media are still use illegal downloading and bittorrent downloading interchangeably.

Have you click/access `Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Create+profile` twice? Only unregistered user can access this url. Registered/existing user click it may override their data. If this assumption is true, you can recover your data from anyone has an old version of ZeroNet/data, i.e. someone takes a snapshot after you posted posts and before you access CreateProfile again, or someone started ZeroNet after you posted posts and shutdown before you access CreateProfile again (and haven't start ZeroNet afterwards). On my machine, there are two snapshots of RedHub 5 days ago and 18 hours ago, on both you just have a single `Hello ZeroMe!` post.

其实和儒家的王道有些像。生意的前提是稳定（有核武器、市场巨大的大国不可能让它陷于战争——光卖军火还不够塞牙缝，也不能让它来打自己，包括军事、经济手段），显然美国觉得如果中国实行和美国形似的政经制度、中国人相信美国宣传的价值观、按照美国宣传的生活方式生活，可以保证稳定。毕竟制度都是抄美国的，哪来勇气对抗，中国人每天都离不开美国的物质、文化产品，全面亲美，如何会支持政府对抗美国？

@P2P: 2to3 坑很多。
@P2P: 因为感觉print语句缺功能，所以改成函数。其实print语句完全可以兼容。2到3大量都是这种明明可以兼容强行不兼容。
@P2P: 2到3绝大部分都是语法的差异，兼容一点语法完全不影响性能，也不影响体积。Python的性能问题主要是对象太灵活，还有没上JIT.
